items.content_html: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.

items.content_html: Salinaka is a simple e-commerce web app built with React JS, TypeScript, and Firebase. It allows users to browse products, manage accounts, and lets admins perform CRUD operations. The app supports Firebase authentication and Firestore for data storage, providing a lightweight, easy-to-deploy solution
items.title: RyanIdris41/Salinaka-E-Comerece-Website: Salinaka is a simple e-commerce web app built with React JS, TypeScript, and Firebase. It allows users to browse products, manage accounts, and lets admins perform CRUD operations. The app supports Firebase authentication and Firestore for data storage, providing a lightweight, easy-to-deploy solution
